=== Tax rate ===
=== Tax rate ===
Googleâs overall effective [[tax rate]] in 2009 was 22.2%, subtantially lower than the U.S. corporate income-tax rate of 35%. The reason is that Google paid a tax rate of only 2.4% for all its income generated outside of the U.S. thanks to [[income shifting]] strategies that take advantage of a number of legal loopholes and [[tax haven|tax havens]] like [[Bermuda]]. Google's overseas tax rate is the lowest of the top five U.S. technology companies by market capitalization.<ref>{{Cite news
